Package com.example.app.controller

Class ManufacturerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.app.controller.ManufacturerController
@RestController @Validated @CrossOrigin(origins="*") public class ManufacturerController extends Object
Controller class for handling manufacturer-related operations.

    • getManufacturers

      @GetMapping(path="/manufacturers") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ManufacturerDTO>> getManufacturers(@RequestParam Integer pageNumber, @RequestParam @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") Integer pageSize, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a page of manufacturers.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity containing a page of manufacturers if the user is authorized, or an unauthorized status if not authorized

    • getManufacturersSortedByProducts

      @GetMapping(path="/manufacturers/sorted-by-products") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ManufacturerProductCountDTO>> getManufacturersSortedByProducts(@RequestParam Integer pageNumber, @RequestParam @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") Integer pageSize, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a page of manufacturers sorted by the number of products they have.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity containing a page of manufacturers sorted by product count if the user is authorized, or an unauthorized status if not authorized

    • getManufacturer

      @GetMapping(path="/manufacturers/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<ManufacturerDTO> getManufacturer(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a specific manufacturer by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the manufacturer ID
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity containing the manufacturer if found and the user is authorized, or a not found status if the manufacturer is not found, or an unauthorized status if not authorized

    • getManufacturerProducts

      @GetMapping(path="/manufacturers/{id}/products", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ProductDTO>> getManufacturerProducts(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @RequestParam Integer pageNumber, @RequestParam @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") Integer pageSize, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a page of products for a specific manufacturer.
      Parameters:
      id - the manufacturer ID
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity containing a page of products if the manufacturer is found and the user is authorized, or a bad request status if the manufacturer is not found, or an unauthorized status if not authorized

    • createManufacturer

      @PostMapping(path="/manufacturers", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> createManufacturer(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid ManufacturerDTO manufacturerDTO, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Creates a new manufacturer.
      Parameters:
      manufacturerDTO - the manufacturer to create
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity with a success message if the manufacturer is created and the user is authorized, or an error message if the user is not authorized

    • updateManufacturer

      @PatchMapping(path="/manufacturers/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> updateManufacturer(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid ManufacturerDTO manufacturerDTO, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Updates a manufacturer.
      Parameters:
      id - the manufacturer ID
      manufacturerDTO - the updated manufacturer details
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity with a success message if the manufacturer is updated and the user is authorized, or an error message if the user is not authorized or the manufacturer is not found

    • deleteManufacturer

      @DeleteMapping(path="/manufacturers/{id}", produces="application/json") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> deleteManufacturer(@PathVariable("id") Integer id, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Deletes a manufacturer.
      Parameters:
      id - the manufacturer ID
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity with a success message if the manufacturer is deleted and the user is authorized, or an error message if the user is not authorized or the manufacturer is not found

    • getManufacturerProductCountsPage

      @GetMapping(path="/manufacturer-product-counts") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ManufacturerProductCountDTO>> getManufacturerProductCountsPage(@RequestParam Integer pageNumber, @RequestParam @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") @Min(value=4L,message="pageSize should be at least 4") @Max(value=10L,message="pageSize should be at most 10") Integer pageSize, @RequestAttribute("user") User user)
      Retrieves a page of manufacturer product counts.
      Parameters:
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      user - the user making the request
      Returns:
      a response entity containing a page of manufacturer product counts if the user is authorized, or an unauthorized status if not authorized
